TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PrintTicketConverter extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: Converts managed <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket"> objects to unmanaged Graphics Device Interface (GDI) [DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844) structures, and vice versa.

remarks.format: ## Remarks None of the methods of this class will validate the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>. To validate it, use <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string deviceName, int32 clientPrintSchemaVersion) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the printer that is bound to the new <see cref="T:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter"> instance.
The Print Schema version to use in the <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket"> and DEVMODE conversion.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter"> class for the specified printer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information on the DEVMODE structure, see [DEVMODE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd183565).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Printing.PrintTicket ConvertDevModeToPrintTicket(unsigned int8[] devMode) cil managed

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.Byte"> array that contains the DEVMODE structure.
Docs.summary: Converts the specified [DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844) structure to a managed code <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket">.

remarks.format:
## Remarks For more information on the DEVMODE structure, see [DEVMODE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd183565).
The scope of the returned <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> is the entire print job.
This method does not validate the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>. To validate it, use <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Printing.PrintTicket ConvertDevModeToPrintTicket (byte[] devMode, System.Printing.PrintTicketScope scope);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Printing.PrintTicket ConvertDevModeToPrintTicket(unsigned int8[] devMode, valuetype System.Printing.PrintTicketScope scope) cil managed

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.Byte"> buffer containing the DEVMODE structure to convert.
A <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicketScope"> value that specifies whether the new <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> applies to a page, a document, or an entire print job.
Docs.summary: Converts the specified [DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844) structure to a managed code <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket"> that has the specified scope.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method does not validate the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>. To validate it, use <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>.
For more information on the DEVMODE structure, see [DEVMODE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd183565).

MemberSignature.Value: public byte[] ConvertPrintTicketToDevMode (System.Printing.PrintTicket printTicket, System.Printing.Interop.BaseDevModeType baseType);
.method public hidebysig instance unsigned int8[] ConvertPrintTicketToDevMode(class System.Printing.PrintTicket printTicket, valuetype System.Printing.Interop.BaseDevModeType baseType) cil managed

Docs.param: A value that identifies whether to use the user default or printer default DEVMODE as the base DEVMODE.
Docs.summary: Converts the specified managed <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket"> to an unmanaged [DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844) structure that is based on the [DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844) structure identified by the <xref:System.Printing.Interop.BaseDevModeType>.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.Byte"> array that contains the new [DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844) structure.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The scope of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> parameter must be the entire print job.
This method does not validate the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>. To validate it, use <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>.
For more information on the DEVMODE structure, see [DEVMODE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd183565).

MemberSignature.Value: public byte[] ConvertPrintTicketToDevMode (System.Printing.PrintTicket printTicket, System.Printing.Interop.BaseDevModeType baseType, System.Printing.PrintTicketScope scope);

.method public hidebysig instance unsigned int8[] ConvertPrintTicketToDevMode(class System.Printing.PrintTicket printTicket, valuetype System.Printing.Interop.BaseDevModeType baseType, valuetype System.Printing.PrintTicketScope scope) cil managed

Docs.param: A value that identifies whether to use the user default or printer default DEVMODE as the base DEVMODE.

A <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicketScope"> value that specifies whether the conversion of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> should be done at the scope of a page, a document, or an entire print job.
Docs.summary: Converts the specified managed code <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket"> with the specified scope, into an unmanaged [DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844) structure that is based on the [DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844) structure identified by the <xref:System.Printing.Interop.BaseDevModeType>.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.Byte"> buffer that represents the new [DEVMODE](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=89844) structure.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method does not validate the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>. To validate it, use <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>.
For more information on the DEVMODE structure, see [DEVMODE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd183565).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Dispose() cil managed

Docs.summary: Releases the resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter">.
Gets the maximum [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) version that <see cref="T:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter"> can support.
Docs.value: The maximum [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) version that <see cref="T:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter"> can support.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.IDisposable.Dispose() cil managed

Docs.summary: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter"> class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the <xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter>. The `Dispose` method leaves the <xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter> in an unusable state. After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter> was occupying.
For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](../Topic/Cleaning%20Up%20Unmanaged%20Resources.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](../Topic/Implementing%20a%20Dispose%20Method.md).
> [!NOTE] > Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter>. Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter> object's `Finalize` method.
